entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning in the afternoon except snow across lower Richelieu. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain except snow across lower Richelieu in the evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 4 cm across lower Richelieu. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
